participant_1.background:

I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.

I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer. How about you?
I'm not into sports, but I love the weather warming up so I can spend more time outdoors. I like to go to the park and practice my music.
That's cool. Do you play an instrument?
Yes, I play the piano. I've been playing since I was a kid.
Wow, that's impressive. I've always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. I have a lot of free time on my days off.
That's perfect. You could always practice in the morning before you start your day.
That's a good idea. I'll have to look into buying a piano.
There are a lot of good used pianos on the market.
Thanks for the tip. I'll keep that in mind.
No problem. I'm always happy to help out a fellow musician.
